name: Dance, Farm & Feed the Monster
description:
Dance to make candies grow.

Copycat moves to dance on a crop and make it grow.
Use keyboard arrows to dance.

Feed the monster with candies.

Feed the monster with the right number of candies

SPACEBAR to trigger action.

The ludum dare entry : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/dance-farm-monster
